key.name: recenter-display-shortcut
key.description: Shortcut to re-center the virtual display.

key.name: toggle-display-distance-shortcut
key.description: Shortcut to change the display distance.

key.name: display-distance
key.description: How far away the display appears. Farther will look smaller, closer will look larger.

key.name: toggle-display-distance-nearest
key.description: How close to bring in the display when using the "change distance" shortcut.

key.name: toggle-display-distance-farthest
key.description: How far to push out the display when using the "change distance" shortcut.
